inspector2_da.description: Delegated Administrator Account ID for Amazon Inspector2..

scanning_type.description: Indicates the type of scan to be enabled by Inspector2

auto_enable.description: the scanning type to be enabled on every account newly attached to the Delegated Administrator

regions.enablement: eu-west-1 eu-west-2 eu-west-3 eu-central-1 us-east-1 us-east-2
regions.description: List of AWS regions - space separated - where the script will execute Amazon Inspector2 commands
